attributes.action: Reconsider the chosen logo for the London 2012 Olympic Games
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The new logo for the London Olympic Games in 2012 has recently been chosen, but it does not in any way reflect anything do do with what it means to be British and what sport and the Olympics signify in London and across the nation. We urge the Prime Minister to completely reconsider the choice and choose a logo that is far superior to the current dogs dinner.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
